name: SustentaHabilidade
description:
Save The Planet !!!

Goal: Achieve 500 points. To do so, you are required to collect the trash thrown out by the antagonist of the game, which keeps throwing different types of trash and you need to send it to the correct trashcan so it can be recycled correctly.

Controls:

Arrow keys - movement;

1 - Collect the trash

P - Throws paper trash;

V - Throws Glass trash;

S - Throws Plastic trash;

M - Throws Metal trash.
